ai.question: What is one symptom of a physical layer problem?
A network administrator has received the output "Serial0 is up, line protocol is down" from the show interface s0 command. At what layer is this problem most likely being caused?
Which statement is true concerning network models?

choice.text: While similar to the OSI model in construction, the TCP/IP model has more layers.
The network access layer in the OSI model incorporates both physical and data link layers in the TCP/IP model.
Both users and application layer processes interact with software applications that contain a communications component in the OSI model.
TCP/IP communications only relate to the TCP/IP model.

ai.question: Which three protocols could be involved in network layer problems? (Choose three.)

ai.question: A technician has been asked to troubleshoot a simple network problem that seems to be caused by software. Which troubleshooting approach should be suggested?
Which three questions are appropriate to ask when gathering information from a user? (Choose three.)

choice.text: Who did you call after the problem appeared?
When was the problem first noticed?
What did you do after the problem occurred?

ai.question: Which network troubleshooting tool can be used to test the physical medium for defects, such as near-end crosstalk?
Which three documents are needed to efficiently diagnose and correct network problems? (Choose three.)
What are three steps for establishing a network baseline? (Choose three.)

choice.text: determine the type of network management traffic to be collected and evaluated
determine the types of data to be collected and evaluated
identify devices and ports to be monitored
identify the virtual interfaces, VLANs, and virtual routing tables to be monitored
determine the number of baseline tests to establish a typical picture of the network
determine the duration for baseline testing to establish a typical picture of the network

ai.question: What is associated with the first step in correcting application layer problems?

choice.text: making the initial hardware or software changes
pinging the default gateway to verify Layer 1 – Layer 3 functionality
